member.summary: Converts the given IUser to an APIUser. Thanks knah for providing this.
member.param: The IUser to convert to APIUser

member.name: T:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.KeybindAttribute
member.summary: An attribute that calls the method it is put on when the given key is pressed. Meant primarily for debugging purposes, but can be utilised for easy keybind creation. Can only be applied to static methods without parameters.

member.name: P:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.KeybindAttribute.KeyCode
member.summary: The key to press to call the attached method.

member.name: M:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.KeybindAttribute.#ctor(UnityEngine.KeyCode)
member.summary: Creates a new keybind. The method the attribute is put on will be called when the given key is pressed. Meant primarily for debugging purposes, but can be utilised for easy keybind creation. Can only be applied to static methods without parameters.
member.param: The key to press to call the attached method

member.name: T:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.MelonLoaderEvents
member.summary: A class that, when inherited, has methods that call at the same time as the MelonMod methods. Primarily to make OnApplicationStart, UIInit, etc. easier to subscribe to. Overrides for any Update methods are unavailable for performance reasons.

member.name: T:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.MelonLoaderEventsAttribute
member.summary: An attribute that effectively acts the same way as MelonLoaderEvents, except as an attribute and not inherited class. Mainly meant so static classes don't need to be instance.

member.name: T:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.MelonLoaderEventsPriorityAttribute
member.summary: An attribute to dictate the priority of the MelonLoaderEvents attribute/class. Lower is higher priority.

member.name: F:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.MelonLoaderEventsPriorityAttribute.priority
member.summary: The priority. Lower is higher priority.

member.name: M:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.MelonLoaderEventsPriorityAttribute.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new MelonLoaderEventsPrority Attribute.
member.param: The priority of the attribute

member.name: T:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.NetworkEvents
member.summary: A set of events pertaining to VRChat's network.

member.name: E:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.NetworkEvents.OnPlayerLeft
member.summary: Calls when a player has left the instance. This will also call as every player is removed after leaving an instance.

member.name: E:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.NetworkEvents.OnPlayerJoined
member.summary: Calls when a player joins the instance. The first call of this may contain a null APIUser.

member.name: E:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.NetworkEvents.OnRoomLeft
member.summary: Calls when the local user leaves an room.

member.name: E:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.NetworkEvents.OnRoomJoined
member.summary: Calls when the local user joins an room.

member.name: E:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.NetworkEvents.OnFriended
member.summary: Calls when a new friend is added. Whether they accepted your friend request or you accepted theirs does not matter.

member.name: E:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.NetworkEvents.OnUnfriended
member.summary: Calls when a friend is removed. Whether you removed them or they removed you does not matter.

member.name: E:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.NetworkEvents.OnInstanceChanged
member.summary: Calls during the loading screen into a new instance. Does not call if there was a desync while joining the instance.

member.name: E:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.NetworkEvents.OnMasterChanged
member.summary: Calls when the master of the instance changes. Does not call upon initialy receiving the master after joining the instance.

member.name: E:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.NetworkEvents.OnAvatarChanged
member.summary: Calls when the internal value of the avatar in an instance of VRCAvatarManager is changed. It will call for every GameObject change. This is not limited to, but includes the error bot and platform substitute.

member.name: E:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.NetworkEvents.OnAvatarInstantiated
member.summary: Calls when an avatar is instantiated

member.name: E:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.NetworkEvents.OnAvatarDownloadProgressed
member.summary: Calls when an avatar download is progressing. The float is percentage and long is total size.

member.name: E:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.NetworkEvents.OnSetupFlagsReceived
member.summary: Calls when the setup flags of a VRCPlayer is received from photon. The int is actually the enum "VRCPlayer.EnumNPrivateSealedvaViMoVRStShAvUsFa9vUnique" at the time of writing.

member.name: E:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.NetworkEvents.OnShowSocialRankChanged
member.summary: Calls when the local user changes whether to show their social rank.

member.name: E:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.NetworkEvents.OnPlayerModerationSent
member.summary: Calls when a player moderation is sent from the local user.

member.name: E:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.NetworkEvents.OnPlayerModerationRemoved
member.summary: Calls when a player moderation is removed by the local user.

member.name: T:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils
member.summary: A set of utilities pertaining to VRChat itself.

member.name: E:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils.OnUiManagerInit
member.summary: Calls when the VRChat UiManager is initialized

member.name: F:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils.OnEmmWorldCheckCompleted
member.summary: Calls when the emm world check finishes.

member.name: P:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils.AreRiskyFunctionsAllowed
member.summary: Returns whether risky functions are allowed in the current world. It is recommended to use OnEmmWorldCheck over this property.

member.name: P:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils.IsUIXPresent
member.summary: Returns whether UIExpansionKit is loaded.

member.name: P:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils.WorldInfoInstance
member.summary: Returns the instance of the WorldInfo component.

member.name: P:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils.UserInfoInstance
member.summary: Returns the instance of the UserInfo component.

member.name: P:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils.MenuControllerInstance
member.summary: Returns the instance of the MenuController.

member.name: P:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils.ActiveUserInUserInfoMenu
member.summary: Returns the active user in the user info menu.

member.name: P:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils.ActivePlayerInUserInfoMenu
member.summary: Returns the active player in the user info menu. Will be null if the player isn't in the instance.

member.name: P:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils.SelectedUser
member.summary: Returns the user selected via the cursor.

member.name: P:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils.SelectedPlayer
member.summary: Returns the player selected via the cursor.

member.name: P:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils.ActiveUserInUserSelectMenu
member.summary: Returns the active user in the user select menu.

member.name: M:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils.IsAvatarExplcitlyShown(VRC.Core.APIUser)
member.summary: Returns whether the given user's avatar is explicity shown.
member.param: The user to check

member.name: M:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils.IsAvatarExplcitlyHidden(VRC.Core.APIUser)
member.summary: Returns whether the given user's avatar is explicity hidden.
member.param: The user to check

member.name: M:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils.ReloadAllAvatars
member.summary: Reloads all avatars.

member.name: M:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils.ReloadAllAvatars(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Reloads all avatars.
member.param: Whether or not to exclude the local player from the reload.

member.name: M:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.VRCUtils.ReloadAvatar(VRCPlayer)
member.summary: Reloads the given player's avatar.
member.param: The given player

member.name: T:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.XrefUtils
member.summary: A set of utilites for Xref scanning.

member.name: P:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.XrefUtils.PrintMethod
member.summary: A method that prints the name of the original method when used in a patch. Useful when figuring out Xrefs.

member.name: M:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.XrefUtils.CheckStrings(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Func{System.String,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Checks the strings in the given method's body.
member.param: The method to check
The predicate to check the strings against
member.returns: true if the predicate returned true any times, otherwise false

member.name: M:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.XrefUtils.CheckStrings(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Returns if a string is contained within the given method's body.
member.param: The method to check
The string to check
member.returns: true if the given string literal is contained within the given method, otherwise false

member.name: M:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.XrefUtils.CheckMethod(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.String)
member.summary: Returns if a string is contained within the given method's body.
member.param: The method to check
The string to check
member.returns: true if the given string literal is contained within the given method, otherwise false

member.name: M:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.XrefUtils.CheckUsedBy(System.Reflection.MethodBase,System.Func{System.Reflection.MethodBase,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Checks the methods the given method is used by. Note: the methods passed into the predicate may be false.
member.param: The method to check
The predicate to check the methods against
member.returns: true if the predicate returned true any times, otherwise false

member.name: M:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.XrefUtils.CheckUsedBy(System.Reflection.MethodBase,System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Returns if the given method is called by the other given method.
member.param: The method to check
The name of the method that uses the given method
The type of the method that uses the given method
member.returns: true if any of the given method is called by a method with the given name of the given type, otherwise false

member.name: M:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.XrefUtils.CheckUsing(System.Reflection.MethodBase,System.Func{System.Reflection.MethodBase,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Checks the methods the given method uses. Note: the methods passed into the predicate may be false.
member.param: The method to check
The predicate to check the methods against
member.returns: true if the predicate returned true any times, otherwise false

member.name: M:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.XrefUtils.CheckUsing(System.Reflection.MethodBase,System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Returns whether the given method is using another the other given method.
member.param: The method to check
The name of the method that is used by the given method
The type of the method that is used by the given method
member.returns: true if any of the given method calls a method with the given name of the given type, otherwise false

member.name: M:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.XrefUtils.DumpXrefInfo(System.Reflection.MethodBase)
member.summary: Dumps the Xref information on a method. This is for DEBUG PURPOSES ONLY.
member.param: The method to dump information on

member.name: M:VRChatUtilityKit.Utilities.XrefUtils.GetTypeFromObfuscatedName(System.String)
member.summary: DO NOT call this often. It is slow.
member.param: The obfuscated name of the type
